text: @GregAbbott_TX Will you be focusing any on saving lives of those incarcerated in @TDCJ units? They are understaffed and over capacity. 76% of those tested inside have come up positive, prison is an incubator for #COVID19. How many are going to die while you ignore them? #FreedomNow
